name: The Jira Cloud platform REST API

actions.name: get_issue
actions.description: Retrieve an issue by {issueIdOrKey}. Returns: changelog, editmeta, expand, fields, fieldsToInclude

actions.name: get_issue_comment
actions.description: Use this to access or manage content. List comment for an issue. Returns: comments, maxResults, startAt, total

actions.name: get_issue_comment__your_domain_atlassian_net
actions.description: Use this to access or manage content. Retrieve a comment by {id}. Returns: author, body, created, id, jsdAuthorCanSeeRequest (Call get_project first to obtain id) (Call get_issue_transitions first to obtain id) (Call create_issue_comment first to obtain id) (Call get_issue first to obtain id) (Call get_project__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain id) (Call create_issue first to obtain id) (Call get_issue_comment first to obtain id) (Call search_jql first to obtain id)

actions.name: get_issue_transitions
actions.description: List transitions for an issue. Returns: expand, transitions

actions.name: get_project__your_domain_atlassian_net
actions.description: Use this to access or manage user information. Retrieve a project by {projectIdOrKey}. Returns: archived, archivedBy, archivedDate, assigneeType, avatarUrls

actions.name: search_jql
actions.description: Use this to search or query data. List all jql. Returns: isLast, issues, names, nextPageToken, schema

actions.name: get_user
actions.description: Use this to access or manage user information. List all user. Returns: accountId, accountType, active, appType, applicationRoles

actions.name: search_users
actions.description: Use this to access or manage user information. List all search

actions.name: create_issue
actions.description: Create a new issue. Returns: id, key, self, transition, watchers (Call get_project first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue_transitions first to obtain fields) (Call create_issue_comment first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue first to obtain fields) (Call get_project__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue_comment__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue_comment first to obtain properties) (Call search_jql first to obtain fields)

actions.name: create_issue_comment
actions.description: Use this to access or manage content. Create a new comment. Returns: author, body, created, id, jsdAuthorCanSeeRequest (Call get_project first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue_transitions first to obtain id) (Call get_issue first to obtain self) (Call get_project__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain properties) (Call get_user first to obtain self) (Call create_issue first to obtain self) (Call get_issue_comment__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain jsdPublic) (Call search_users first to obtain self) (Call get_issue_comment first to obtain self) (Call search_jql first to obtain self)

actions.name: create_issue_transition
actions.description: Create a new transition (Call get_project first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue_transitions first to obtain fields) (Call create_issue_comment first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue first to obtain fields) (Call get_project__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain properties) (Call create_issue first to obtain transition) (Call get_issue_comment__your_domain_atlassian_net first to obtain properties) (Call get_issue_comment first to obtain properties) (Call search_jql first to obtain fields)
